channel.title: Multiple drop?
channel.description: Is there a command to, tell it how many of what item you want to drop? like ::item_(item #)_(nuber of items droped?) is there a code I can do that?

item.title: Multiple drop?
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Ch00b Owner Ch00b
item.description:
@Owner_Ch00b wrote:

No, wow aparently I cant get my point across to any one, while playing the game, is there a command to tell the command how many of the item I want to be droped, ::item (Item ID) (Number Of Item’s) <--------- any code to do that, while playing, I heard about pickupitem or soemthing like that but is there a command?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 03, 2007, 02:11:22 PM[/size][hr]::pickup (Any#) (Ammount of droped item) jesus christ you ppl cant grasp the consept, w/e i’m out…

Read full topic

item.title: Multiple drop?

item.description:
@King_Dawgs wrote:

That would be determined in the Client. Which you can make how much you want to drop. Like Say drop 10M every 30 Seconds. Easy as that
